definition: Models that accept multiple modalities as input and generate outputs in one or more modalities.
Generate text responses given audio and/or text inputs.
Answer questions about the content of documents (often PDFs or scans) using text and layout/vision.
Retrieve relevant pages or documents based on a text or image query, leveraging document visuals.
Generate text conditioned on both an image and text prompt.
Generate text (captions, answers, summaries) from video and text prompts.
Answer natural-language questions about an image.
Produce vector representations (embeddings or features) from text.
Predict masked tokens in a text sequence.
Extract or generate answers to questions, optionally given a context passage.
Assess how semantically similar two texts are.
Generate concise summaries of longer texts.
Answer questions grounded in table-structured data.
Assign labels or categories to text.
Generate new text given a prompt.
Rank documents or passages by relevance to a query.
Assign labels at the token level (e.g., named entities).
Translate text from one language to another.
Classify text into arbitrary, unseen labels via prompts or descriptions.
Predict per-pixel depth from an image.
Assign one or more labels to an image.
Produce vector features or embeddings from images.
Predict pixel-wise regions for objects or stuff classes.
Transform an input image into a modified output image.
Generate text describing an image.
Generate a video from one or more images.
Detect keypoints or landmarks in images.
Produce segmentation masks for regions or objects in images.
Detect and localize objects with bounding boxes.
Assign labels to videos based on their content.
Generate images conditioned on a text prompt.
Generate videos conditioned on a text prompt.
Generate images without a specific conditioning prompt.
Transform an input video into a new video.
Classify images into unseen categories using text prompts or descriptions.
Detect objects from unseen categories using language supervision.
Generate 3D assets from a text prompt.
Generate 3D assets from one or more images.
Assign labels to audio clips.
Transform input audio into output audio (e.g., denoising, conversion).
Transcribe spoken audio into text.
Synthesize speech audio from text.
Classify rows of tabular data into labels.
Predict continuous values from tabular features.
Optimize an agent's policy via interactions and rewards.
